title: (1982) The Police - Around The World.avi
description:
This excellent video covers the band&#039;s career up until the &#039;Zenyatta Mondatta&#039; album. Featuring extensive coverage and highlights mainly from their famous 1980 world tour, and many candid behind the scenes footage, this truly is a superb video about a groundbreaking band on a groundbreaking tour - and that&#039;s no hype. Some of the highlights include concert footage from Hong Kong, Japan, India, Egypt, Greece (the two minute Greek holiday), the boys riding camels around the pyramids, dressed as gauchos in Argentina, and a wild-eyed Sting losing it completely at a French show with someone in the audience - perhaps a security guy - calling them "you fuckin&#039; bastard", prior to gobbing into the audience then leaning forward and hitting someone with the neck of his bass. 

01 Next To You    
02 Light Changes    
03 Walking On The Moon    
04 Born In The 50&#039;s    
05 So Lonely    
06 Man In A Suitcase    
07 Can&#039;t Stand Losing You    
08 Bring On The Night    
09 Canary In A Coalmine    
10 Voices Inside My Head    
11 Driven To Tears    
12 When The World Is Running Down You Make The Best Of What&#039;s Still Around    
13 Shadows In The Rain    
14 De Do Do Do, De Da Da Da    
15 Don&#039;t Stand So Close To Me    
16 Roxanne    
17 Truth Hits Everybody    
18 Message In A Bottle
